name: Dust Bunnies (Ripoob)
description: Far away and long ago, in a fantasy kingdom, lived a lowly Dust Bunny. Downtrodden and abused by his society, he hid away in the castle cellar he called home. One day however, he discovered an artifact from another world, and with this newfound power, took it upon himself to destroy the kingdom. Through the subjugation of his fellow Dust Bunnies, he built the Cellar Empire, and declared himself the Big Boss! The Kingdom grew fearful of the Big Boss, who was preparing his bunnies for an assault above ground; equipping them with new weapons and technologies to overpower the kingdom's knights. Not knowing what else to do, they called in the only person they knew with the powers of both a Knight and a Maid; a sacred soldier with the power to banish the dust - The Sanitary Squire!
